question: Thuộc thiên văn học; cực kỳ lớn.
example: One day, it approached the area of an astronomical star.
english-definition: Relating to astronomy; (of an amount) extremely large.

question: Nguyên tử.
example: It felt like an insignificant atom.
english-definition: The smallest unit of any chemical element.

question: Bề rộng, bề ngang.
example: The sphere had a circumference hundreds of times larger than the breadth of the small rock.
english-definition: The distance or measurement from side to side of something; width.

question: Chu vi (của đường tròn).
example: The sphere had a circumference hundreds of times larger than the breadth of the small rock.
english-definition: The distance around the edge of a circle or a round object.

question: Sao chổi.
example: Then the steam extended behind the comet to form a brilliant tail.
english-definition: A celestial object consisting of a nucleus of ice and dust and, when near the sun, a ‘tail’ of gas and dust particles pointing away from the sun.

question: Hố (do va chạm thiên thạch hoặc núi lửa).
example: It flew by beautiful crescent moons that were covered with craters and moon dust.
english-definition: A large bowl-shaped hole in the ground or on the surface of a planet or moon, typically one caused by an explosion or the impact of a meteorite.

question: Hình lưỡi liềm.
example: It flew by beautiful crescent moons that were covered with craters and moon dust.
english-definition: The curved sickle shape of the waxing or waning moon.

question: Mảnh vỡ, mảnh vụn.
example: It slowly drifted through the debris of broken asteroids with a feeling of sadness.
english-definition: Scattered pieces of waste or remains.

question: Sự tuyệt vọng.
example: The rock was filled with despair.
english-definition: The complete loss or absence of hope.

question: Ấn vào, gắn vào.
example: Suddenly, the ice that was embedded in the rock’s tiny cracks melted and became steam.
english-definition: To fix (an object) firmly and deeply in a surrounding mass.

question: Mảnh vỡ, mảnh.
example: It was surrounded by beauty and greatness, yet it was just a small and ugly fragment of rock.
english-definition: A small part broken off or separated from something.

question: Thiên hà.
example: In the vast and beautiful galaxy, it was only a tiny rock.
english-definition: A system of millions or billions of stars, together with gas and dust, held together by gravitational attraction.

question: Khổng lồ, kếch xù.
example: The rock passed a gigantic planet.
english-definition: Of very great size or extent; huge or enormous.

question: Sự u ám, tăm tối, buồn bã.
example: A solitary rock roamed through the cold gloom of outer space.
english-definition: Partial or total darkness; a state of depression or despondency.

question: Tỏa ra, phát ra (nhiệt, ánh sáng, năng lượng).
example: The star radiated its light brighter and hotter than it had ever done before.
english-definition: To emit (energy, especially light or heat) in the form of rays or waves.

question: Đi lang thang, đi rong chơi.
example: A solitary rock roamed through the cold gloom of outer space.
english-definition: To move about or travel aimlessly or unsystematically, especially over a wide area.

question: Đơn độc, một mình.
example: A solitary rock roamed through the cold gloom of outer space.
english-definition: Done or existing alone.

question: Quang phổ; một dải rộng (ý kiến, đối tượng, v.v.).
example: The tail shined with all the colors of the spectrum.
english-definition: A band of colors, as seen in a rainbow, produced by separation of the components of light; a wide range.

question: Hình cầu, quả cầu.
example: The sphere had a circumference hundreds of times larger than the breadth of the small rock.
english-definition: A round solid figure, or its surface, with every point on its surface equidistant from its center.

question: Địa vị, thân phận; tình trạng.
example: Oh, I wish I had a higher status in the galaxy.
english-definition: The relative social, professional, or other standing of someone or something; the situation at a particular time.
